reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson explains complex concepts clearly. Her enthusiasm for physics is contagious.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor. Prof. Chen's projects are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson knows her stuff, but her lectures can be a bit disorganized.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Rodriguez makes calculus understandable. Always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Best chemistry professor ever! Dr. Patel's labs are well-designed and her explanations are crystal clear.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson seems knowledgeable but his lectures are very dry and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia brings psychology to life with real-world examples. Assignments can be tough though.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's classes are okay. He could provide more practical applications of economic theories.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Foster's passion for literature is inspiring. Her feedback on essays is incredibly helpful.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Brown encourages critical thinking. Class discussions are always engaging.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Kim's lectures are informative but her grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Mind-blowing classes! Prof. Murphy really makes you question everything.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Wright's knowledge of art is extensive. Her museum field trips are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor seems more focused on research than teaching. Often cancels classes.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is fantastic! Her passion for the environment is infectious and her projects are very practical.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Nguyen knows statistics well but can sometimes overcomplicate simple concepts.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Romano makes linguistics fun and accessible. Her assignments are creative and engaging.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Carter has good industry knowledge but his teaching style can be a bit boring.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is brilliant! Her lectures are fascinating and she's always up-to-date with the latest research.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez is a skilled musician and teacher. His ear training exercises are particularly helpful.
